Package org.drasyl

Class ObservableDrasylNode

java.lang.Object
org.drasyl.DrasylNode
org.drasyl.ObservableDrasylNode
public class ObservableDrasylNode extends DrasylNode
This particular Implementation of a drasyl Node shows exemplary how incoming Events can be processed using the Observer Pattern.
